Game Information

What's goin' on this time
I've become a little green Sylvie Lime
What's got you movin' so fine
Dancing to the rhythm of a Sylvie Lime

Sylvie Lime is a new exploration adventure platformer with absurd game mechanics, a funny and cute world, and a girls' love story told in secret rooms.

The club members will be graduating soon, and they poured their hearts into this work. What feelings and regrets may linger within?

Why does it cost $999???

It doesn't. Sylvie Lime was commissioned by Indiepocalypse, and is currently an "Indiepocalypse exclusive" which you can get by purchasing Indiepocalypse #34 for $15!

Alternatively, I am offering a promotion where I give out a limited number of free copies of the game for people who can't buy it (see below). To make this free copy feature work properly, I need to set a price for Sylvie Lime, so I set a really high price that nobody would pay. Sorry for being confusing.

When the Indiepocalypse exclusivity period is over, the game will just be downloadable for free from this page and the page won't be confusing anymore.
